parameters.name: status_
parameters.description: status. only get [unconfirmed, confirmed, approved, dispatched, delivered, canceled] orders

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: returns orders which have addresses in this city

parameters.name: include_
parameters.description: line_items, address, delivery_boy - whether to include association
